name: Connecticut
notes: Connecticut does not use the letter 'O' on standard plates. Only the number zero '0' is used to avoid confusion. Source: OOS.txt compilation - requires verification with official DMV documentation. Does not use letter 'O' on standard plates. Always use zero '0'.

processing_metadata.description: Official Connecticut DMV processing rules and validation requirements

global_rules.character_restrictions: Does not use letter 'O' on standard plates - only number zero '0'
